sentences.en: Both hypha and haustorial mother cell were dikaryotic, while the typical mature haustorium was mono - karyotic.
sentences.cn: 胞间菌丝和吸器母细胞均含有双核, 而成熟吸器则含有单核.

sentences.en: Conidia are cut off externally in chains at the apex of a specialized hypha, the conidiophore.
sentences.cn: 分生孢子是由分生孢子囊梗的顶端或侧面产生的一种不动孢子, 借气流或动物传播的.

sentences.en: Dextrose and maltose was the best carbon source, while asparagine (Asn)was the optimum nitrogen source for both hypha growth and spore bearing.
sentences.cn: 葡萄糖和麦芽糖为菌丝生长和产孢的最佳碳源。 天冬酰胺是菌丝生长和孢子产生的最佳氮源。

sentences.en: Effect of dews on cucumber leaves and juice of cucumber leaves of different varieties on the ratio of germination, quantity of sprout and length of hypha was different.
sentences.cn: 不同黄瓜品种叶表露珠及叶片研磨液对分生孢子萌发率、 芽管数量、菌丝长短有显著影响。

sentences.en: The antifungal mechanism of Trichoderma is varied, including antibiotic, dissolve hypha, parasitism and competition.
sentences.cn: 木霉菌的作用机制多种多样, 包括产生抗生素、重寄生作用 、 溶菌作用、竞争作用等.

sentences.en: The effects of five fungicides on the hypha growth of Ganoderma lucidum were studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了五种杀菌剂对灵芝菌丝生长的影响.

sentences.en: The state in certain fungi in which each compartment of a hypha contains two nuclei, each derived from a different parent.
sentences.cn: 双核某种真菌中的状态，在这种真菌中，每个菌丝体都含有两个核，而每个核都是从不同的母体上衍生的。

trans.tran_en: any of the filaments that constitute the body (mycelium) of a fungus
